description: Generate 12 unique AISMR ideas using LLM with structured output

llm_generation.prompt: Generate exactly 12 unique AISMR video ideas about ${context.userInput}. Each idea must be in Title Case descriptor + singular object format (two words). For each idea, provide a 2-4 sentence vibe covering emotion, hook, texture, feasibility, replay value, and environment potential. Exclude any ideas similar to these past ideas: ${pastIdeas}. Use these patterns for inspiration: ${inspirationResults}.
